posts.post_content:
Hi, I have been slowly working on a T206 Boston Americans team set. I'd like to try and knock another one off the list. I would prefer graded (PSA or SGC), but will certainly consider raw as well. I am looking for cards in the VG range to EX range, but since its a collector's set, I am more interested in how they look they then how they technically grade. I prefer soft corners to creases. Any back is good.

Anyways, here are the ones I'm looking for:

Bill Carrigan
Ed Cicotte
Harry Lord
Harry Niles
Tubby Spencer
Heinie Wagner (Bat on Left Shoulder)
Red Kleinow (I know this is a rare one, so I'm less picky about condition)

Thanks for looking!

Johnny,
I have an extra Kleinow, but it does have a Tolstoi back.  Front is VG-VGEX, but has toning on the back corners from the old interst style scrapbook.
Here is a pic.

Thanks, card will ship the first of the week!

Thanks and good luck,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]

[URL="http://s588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/?action=view&current=T206TolstoiKleinowBOSfront.jpg"][IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/T206TolstoiKleinowBOSfront.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL="http://s588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/?action=view&current=T206TolstoiKleinowBOSback.jpg"][IMG]http://i588.photobucket.com/albums/ss329/upperhandisforemost/T206TolstoiKleinowBOSback.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Have this one for sale on my website.   Link is in the sig line.   Thanks for looking and good luck completing the team set.
